GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 15 October 2023

S
howers or thundershowers will occur over most parts of the island after 2.00 p.m.
Fairly heavy showers above 75 mm can be expected at some places in Uva, Easten, Northern and
North-Central provinces.
A few showers may occur in coastal areas of the western and southern provinces during the morning
too.
Misty  conditions  can  be  expected  at  some  places  in  Central,  Sabaragamuwa  and  Uva  provinces
during the morning.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused
by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
Rainfall amount (mm): Light: 00-12.50, Light to moderate: 12.50-25, moderate: 25-50, Fairly Heavy rain: 50 -100,
